document_data.mainbody: '''''Best of The Dragon #4''''' was published by [[TSR, Inc.]] in May of 1985.  It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:
document_data.The Bandit:
: ''By [[Roger E. Moore]] and [[Tom Armstrong]].'' '''p. 4'''
A shifty non-player character. (From [[Dragon magazine 63|Issue #63]])
document_data.The Cloistered Cleric:
: ''By [[Lenard Lakofka]].'' '''p. 7'''
A new NPC class representing the non-adventuring cleric. Includes new spells.  (From [[Dragon magazine 68|Issue #68]])
document_data.The Scribe:
: ''By [[Ed Greenwood]].'' '''p. 23'''
A new AD&D NPC class. (From [[Dragon magazine 62|Issue #62]])
document_data.The Smith:
: ''By [[Ed Greenwood]].'' '''p. 26'''
A new human-only non-player character class. (From [[Dragon magazine 70|Issue #70]])
document_data.Be Aware, Take Care:
: ''By [[Lewis Pulsipher]].'' '''p. 30'''
Ideas based on common sense and cooperation to help your characters live longer.  (From [[Dragon magazine 79|Issue #79]])
document_data.Two-Fisted Fighting:
: ''By [[Roger E. Moore]].'' '''p. 45'''
New rules for fighting with two weapons. (From [[Dragon magazine 68|Issue #68]])
document_data.A PC and His Money:
: ''By [[Lewis Pulsipher]].'' '''p. 55'''
Ways to (fairly) separate players from their treasure. (From [[Dragon magazine 74|Issue #74]])
document_data.When it gets hit, it gets hurt: A system:
: ''By [[Arthur Collins]].'' '''p. 67'''
A system to figure wear, tear, and damage to arms and armor in Advanced Dungeons & Dragons. (From [[Dragon magazine 73|Issue #73]])
document_data.Runestones:
: ''By [[Ed Greenwood]]'' '''p. 77'''
A description of the dwarven "Dethek" runic alphabet and runestones, with examples of a few runic inscriptions. (From [[Dragon magazine 69|Issue #69]])
